text: 匾 嶂 high-resolution image point sampling trilinear mipmap anisotropic filtering Figure 11.19. The results of antialiasing a challenging test scenc (reference images showing detailed structure, at left) using three different strategies: simply taking a single point sample with nearest-neighbor interpolation; using a mipmap pyramid to average a square area in the texture for each pixel; using several samples from a mipmap to average an anisotropic region in the texture.
